title: Samsung Galaxy S22
description: Dimensions: 70.6 x 146 x 7.6mm, Weight: 167g , *Galaxy S22 mmWave model weighs 168g
content: Galaxy S22 is available in four Samsung-exclusive colors. The Galaxy S22 starts at $799 for a base model with 128GB of storage, 6.1 flat FHD+ Dynamic AMOLED 2X , Infinity-O Display (2340x1080), 425 ppi , HDR10+ certified , 120Hz refresh rate

title: Galaxy Buds2
description: Galaxy Buds2 open a new world of sound with well-balanced audio, lightweight comfort fit, Active Noise Cancellation and seamless connectivity to your Galaxy phone and watch
content: Galaxy Buds2 is lightweight (5g each) and keeps music snug in your ears for even the most active lifestyles. With three sizes of soft, flexible silicon tips you can find a custom fit to get the best ANC experience possible. Find your fit with the 'Earbud fit test' menu in the Galaxy Wearable app.
